features: Moisturizes and Cleanses - This pH balance feminine wash comes with active ingredients to cleanse your skin effectively. Stripped skin is not a problem with vitamin E and Aloe Vera which soothes your skin after every wash leaving it smooth and moisturized

Active Key ingredients - Feminine wash for women is made using effective key ingredients such as Tea tree oil, lactic acid, chamomile and vegetable glycerin. All of these ingredients effectively promote intimate area health. A great addition to your sensitive skin washes products

Balances pH Level - Natural feminine wash comes with a pH level of 4.0 which naturally balances the pH level of your intimate area. This makes our natural feminine wash an effective barrier against problem causing particles and relieves skin irritation as it maintains proper hygiene levels

Leaves Your Skin Fresh - Foaming feminine wash is specially formulated with clinically proven formula to deeply freshen your skin. This pH wash for women contains lactic acid that effectively relieves any bad odor for refreshment, leaving your skin with pleasant fragrance

Safe for Everyday Use - Gentle feminine wash for women pH balance is formulated to be gentle on skin for daily use. Female wash is free from Parabens, Fragrances, SLS and ALS which prevents any itching or discomfort when used. Suitable pH balanced feminine wash for all skin types

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dr. Schavit Daily Hygienic Intimate Skin Wash with Sea Buckthorn and Tea Tree Oil – 16.9 Fl.Oz (500ml) Keeping your intimate areas clean and hygienic is an essential part of personal hygiene While the intimate region of a female’s body has a natural self-cleaning system, it is still important to take good care of it through hygiene practices. One of the easiest ways to do it is by using a quality pH feminine wash. Keep your intimate area healthy and start using “Dr.Schavit” intimate feminine wash every day. Our organic intimate wash for women will not only eliminate the chances of skin problems but will also make you feel fresh

Safe for Everyday Use Gentle feminine wash for women pH balance is formulated to be gentle on skin for daily use. Female wash is free from Parabens, Fragrances, SLS and ALS which prevents any itching or discomfort when used. Suitable pH balanced feminine wash for all skin types

Gentle on Your Skin Being aware and concerned about your intimate health, we keep your safety as a front and center while we formulate the best effective formula for you. Our feminine wash for women pH balance is made using tea tree oil, lactic acid, probiotics, chamomile and vegetable glycerin as active key ingredients, all of which promotes good health of your intimate area. Our feminine wash products for women are free from parabens, artificial fragrance, SLS and AL’s .This prevents any itching or discomfort whenever used and leaves soothing effect on your skin

Promotes Intimate Area Health Keeping your intimate area cleaned holds a prime importance to boost up your confidence. The calming, soothing and healing herbal ingredients in our women feminine wash/cleanser will help to keep the pH of your most sensitive area balanced. This effective femine wash for women pH balance also relieves bad smell without drying it and helps with skin miniaturization
Note: Before you buy, check if you have any sensitivity from any ingredient listed in above description. Not meant to be ingested, for external use only

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my purchase.I almost did not buy because of some reviews regarding the scent.The scent of the wash is very medicinal, herbal. Not too overwhelming.I have been using for a week and I feel like I am using a much more natural product than Vagisil.A pea size drop goes a very long way.Happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product Bad packaging
reviews.reviewText: The product is great but as others mentioned the packaging is terrible . Beside product waste it also ruined other items.... I am bewildered why it doesn't come with some basic protection like carton box or at least gripper seal to form a leakproof seal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this feminine wash for almost a year now. I have tried other brands over the years. I absolutely love the scent. I don’t itch after using it and my skin feels soft and moisturized. And, this bottle lasts for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Needs better packaging
reviews.reviewText: The product is really good but the packaging, not so much. I needed to return it twice because the bottle was open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Feels good! Lathers well! And doesn't iritate my Vag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love love love! My new favorite feminine wash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Wife loves it
reviews.reviewText: Not much else to say but my wife loves the product. I didn't ask too many other questions.
